*[http://leiffrenzel.de Leif Frenzel]* is a developer and agile development coach at [http://andrena.de andrena objects], a software company in Karlsruhe, Germany. 

Leif has worked as developer, architect and project lead at Innoopract (now !EclipseSource) from 2001 to 2007, and as project management coach at Nero from 2007-2009. He has also initiated and maintained Open Source projects building Eclipse support for functional programming languages (Haskell) and distributed revision control (Darcs).
